Description:
Detects the use of PSAsyncShell an Asynchronous TCP Reverse Shell written in powershell

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PSAsyncShell - Asynchronous TCP Reverse Shell
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where scriptblocktext like '%psasyncshell%'
